extendedInfo.description: Formerly known as Find A Starbucks, relaunched with a new name and logo after receiving a Cease and Desist from Starbucks.Update:Support has been added for Dunkin' Donuts, Peets Coffee, Tim Hortons, Caribou Coffee, Seattle's Best, and Au Bon Pain. Nutritional Information is now also available from the menu.If you love Starbucks coffee then this is the Starbucks finder app for you. Itâs real easy to use and will help you find a Starbucks store that is close to your current location.Usage:On start the application tries to determine your current location using either gps or network (wifi + 3g). Once your location is determined a default search will be performed which will return the 10 closest Starbucks stores to your location. Using the phone menu button you can bring up the menu options to search, move the map to your location, clear the results, etc. Using this search option or the search button brings up the search dialog. On this dialog you can filter your search based on stores with certain features such as drive-through or open 24 hours.Features:    * Search by:          o using your current location either gps or network          o search by address you enter          o search by tapping a location on the map    * When searching you can specify          o Stores open 24 hours          o Stores with drive-throughs          o Stores that accept mobile pay    * Contains Map and List views          o The map view shows your current location and the location of the Starbucks stores. Tapping on a location shows a popup with more information.          o The list view shows information about each Starbucks store.          o Information shown includes                + address                + phone number                + hours if available and also whether the store is currently open.                + features such as mobile pay, drive-through, wifi, etc          o Clicking on either a map popup or a store in the List will direct you to Google Maps with turn by turn navigation to the store          o Long clicking on a store in the List will call the store (maybe if the hours arenât available).Permissions Used:    * Fine and Coarse Location - to determine your location    * Internet - used to retrieve map and starbucks dataPlease email for support before leaving a negative review.Starbucks, the Starbucks logo are (c) Starbucks Corporation. Coffee Finder is not affiliated with or endorsed by the Starbucks Corporation.

reviews.title: User friendly
reviews.comment: Locations should be specific Whether or not there located within another busyness. Otherwise this app is very helpful.
reviews.author: Steve Fruin

reviews.title: Okay but...
reviews.comment: Love this app, but it won\'t let me search addresses. Keep giving error \'geocoder request failed\'.
reviews.author: Paula Meldrum

reviews.title: Identity?
reviews.comment: What\'s up with the phone status and identity permission?  Shouldn\'t be needed for the pro version...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What a total POS this app is! Just bought it and it constantly hangs or crashes. Save your money for a coffee at Starbucks that you find yourself!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love Starbucks and this helps me find one where I am
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a truly well designed app. For a Starbuck fan a must or just support quality development.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Not sure how it finds the stores but we have a Dunking Donuts that has been open for a year that does not show up in Bowling Green, Oh. Otherwise, everything else seems to be working on Samsung S3
reviews.author: A Google User
